item.title: What we know about the joint US-Israel attack on Iran
item.summary: Iran has retaliated with a missile barrage towards Israel, while explosions have been heard in Qatar, Bahrain, Saudi Arabia, and the UAE.

item.title: Starmer chairs Cobra meeting over US-Israeli strikes on Iran
item.summary: A government spokesperson says it does not want "further escalation" as air travel disrupted.

item.title: Polanski and Farage don't agree. But they have more in common than you might think
item.summary: Despite huge political differences, the Green and Reform leaders have much in common, writes Laura Kuenssberg.

item.title: The third man who links Andrew with Jeffrey Epstein
item.summary: For nearly a decade, David Stern acted as a key conduit between Jeffrey Epstein and Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor.

item.title: Bill Clinton asked about hot tub photo and testifies he knew 'nothing' of Epstein crimes
item.summary: The former president told the committee that he would never have flown on Epstein's plane if he "had any inkling of what he was doing".

item.title: Mahmood to press on with immigration reforms despite by-election defeat
item.summary: The home secretary is to double down on plans for Danish-style restrictions on asylum seekers.

item.title: Captured off guard: The art of the snatched backseat car photo
item.summary: Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor is the latest in a long line of famous people photographed in the back of a car.

item.title: Formula 1's new golden age of celebrity may have just begun
item.summary: As the eighth series of Netflix's hugely popular Drive To Survive is released this weekend, has Formula 1 become one big star playground?

item.title: 'It feels like my brain is trying to be the class clown' - the reality of Tourette's
item.summary: After a week of Tourette's in the spotlight, BBC News speaks to people with the condition about what it's like to live with.

item.title: Resident Evil Requiem's director on redefining the survival horror genre
item.summary: Director Koshi Nakanishi says balancing action and horror within the game has been a huge challenge.
